/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the image. The buildings on either side of the street are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
